description: HTF Thesis target entry levels and alert conditions. Sourced from research/htf-thesis.md

BTC.current_thesis: Cyclical bear, secular bull. Accumulate at cycle low.

HYPE.current_thesis: Best fundamentals in crypto. Wait for bear capitulation.

AMZN.current_thesis: Infrastructure at software multiples. Buy 15-20% dip.

MSFT.current_thesis: Decade-low valuation but OpenAI dependency risk. Buy 15-20% dip.

SOLS.current_thesis: Nuclear conversion monopoly. Easy money made at ATH. Wait for pullback.

LEU.current_thesis: HALEU monopoly for SMRs. Down 60% from highs, PE=30x still expensive. Patient money on further weakness.

CCJ.current_thesis: PE=132x absurd for commodity producer. Avoid until sanity returns.

DNN.current_thesis: Hold. Pure uranium beta. Pre-revenue exploration play.

ASML.current_thesis: EUV monopoly but PE=48x at new highs. Wait for 25-30% correction.

AMAT.current_thesis: Semicap oligopoly. More diversified than ASML. Actionable on 30%+ decline.

CEG.current_thesis: Nuclear utility. Thesis intact but multiples excessive.

VST.current_thesis: PE=46x even more expensive than CEG. Wait for significant correction.

SMR.current_thesis: Down 76% from highs. SMR tech real but commercial deployment years away. Speculative.

OKLO.current_thesis: Down 67% from highs. Speculative nuclear play. Sanity returning to pricing.

FCX.current_thesis: Copper structural deficit 2028+ but near-term inventory overhang.

GLD.current_thesis: Monetary hedge for AI deflation scenario. Reasonable allocation.

TLT.current_thesis: Duration hedge for AI deflation → stimulus response. Position for rate cuts.

BYD.current_thesis: Highest conviction Asia play. Global EV winner. Execution undeniable.
BYD.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for HKEX. Will set levels once price data available.

BABA.current_thesis: Cheapest China AI infrastructure play. Cloud + e-commerce floor.
BABA.note: US-listed ADR available on free tier. Set levels once current price checked.

XIAOMI.current_thesis: EV + ecosystem optionality. Yu7 #1 selling car in China Jan 2026.
XIAOMI.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for HKEX.

SMIC.current_thesis: China semi self-sufficiency. Decade-long theme. Margin trough may be opportunity.
SMIC.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for HKEX.

ZHIPU.current_thesis: Pure-play Chinese AI lab. Speculative. Wait for post-hype pullback.
ZHIPU.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for HKEX.

SK_HYNIX.current_thesis: HBM king. Memory supercycle. Strongest conviction Asian semi.
SK_HYNIX.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for KRX.

KIOXIA.current_thesis: NAND flash recovery. +100% ASP growth CY2026.
KIOXIA.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for TSE.

MU.current_thesis: DUAL VIEW: HBM bull (Jukan) vs commodity cycle top bear (Citron/SMIC CEO/Daniel Wu). Commodity DRAM/NAND oversupply expected Q3 2026. MU Jan 2027 puts = primary short expression.
MU.note: SMIC CEO Q3 2026 commodity reversal. Double whammy: new fabs + channel liquidation. China supply (CXMT/YMTC) hits global. Long thesis (Jukan HBM4) suspended pending cycle resolution.

SNDK.current_thesis: Pure NAND play. Citron short target. Most exposed to commodity NAND oversupply Q3-Q4 2026.

short_entry.note: Less liquid than MU. Citron already positioned. Secondary expression.

VNET.current_thesis: US-listed China DC operator. AI infra play.
VNET.note: US-listed FREE tier. Current price $13.32 (2026-02-13). Buy zone = 25-40% pullback.

MINIMAX.current_thesis: Consumer AI products. Talkie 11M MAU. Speculative.
MINIMAX.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for HKEX.

MITSUI_KINZOKU.current_thesis: Copper foil. AI server + EV battery demand.
MITSUI_KINZOKU.note: Needs Twelve Data Pro for TSE.

ATI.current_thesis: Citrini top pick. Only pure play nickel superalloy capacity expansion. Energy inflection kicker.
ATI.note: Current price $142.29 (2026-02-13). Buy zone = 25-30% pullback. Watch = 15% below.

HXL.current_thesis: Citrini top pick. Purest Western aerospace carbon fiber. At trough earnings, about to inflect.
HXL.note: Current price $90.35 (2026-02-13). Buy weakness name. Buy zone = 20% below. Watch = 10% below.

CLF.current_thesis: Only US GOES producer. Grid modernization + transformer shortage play.
CLF.note: Current price $10.39 (2026-02-13). Cyclical steel. Buy zone = 25-30% below. Watch = 15% below.

HWM.current_thesis: Premier superalloy name but priced for perfection at 40.8x EV/EBITDA. Track only.
HWM.note: Current price $250.56 (2026-02-13). Too expensive. Buy only on 30-40% correction. Alerts disabled.

CRS.current_thesis: Additive mfg + 3D printing optionality. Aerospace recovery play.
CRS.note: Current price $375.14 (2026-02-13). Buy zone = 25% below. Watch = 15% below.

AAVE.current_thesis: Dominant lending protocol. Tokenomics upgrade (buybacks) incoming. Safest DeFi blue chip.
AAVE.note: Current price $125 (2026-02-15). Buy zone = 20% pullback. Insomniac says Morpho may eat institutional share but AAVE is the safe bet.

MORPHO.current_thesis: Institutional lending dark horse. Coinbase partnership, curated vaults. Insomniac's top pick over AAVE for institutional flow.
MORPHO.note: Current price $1.32 (2026-02-15). Buy zone = 20-25% pullback. Smart money high conviction.

PENDLE.current_thesis: Only yield trading protocol at scale. Zero competition. Every new yield asset = new TAM.

LIT.current_thesis: Lighter.xyz — HYPE challenger perp DEX. $920M Circle USDC revenue-share deal. Asymmetric bet.
LIT.note: Current price $1.59 (2026-02-15). High risk/reward. Buy zone = 20-30% pullback.

ETHFI.current_thesis: Largest liquid restaking protocol. Leveraged bet on EigenLayer/restaking narrative.
ETHFI.note: Current price $0.47 (2026-02-15). Dependent on ETH performance + EigenLayer. Buy zone = 20-25% pullback.

SKY.current_thesis: Ex-MakerDAO. Largest decentralized stablecoin issuer. RWA revenue, burn mechanism.
SKY.note: Current price $0.066 (2026-02-15). Rebrand confusion. Buy zone = 20-25% pullback.

SYRUP.current_thesis: Maple Finance. Institutional under-collateralized lending. Real credit spreads. Smallest position — higher risk.
SYRUP.note: Current price $0.26 (2026-02-15). Niche institutional play. Buy zone = 20-25% pullback.

LASR.current_thesis: Only pure-play megawatt DEW company. Transitioning from component supplier to weapons integrator. HELSI megawatt contract completing 2026. Golden Dome RFP engagement. Citrini entry $8.47, bull case ~$150, bear ~$35.
LASR.note: Current price $55 (2026-02-18). Citrini 3:1 risk/reward. Bear case $35 requires DEW spending to disappoint across US/UK/Israel simultaneously. 11x trailing revenue.

OII.current_thesis: 60yr undersea robotics company pivoting to defense. Largest DoD contract in company history (2025), ramping 2026/27. SIIPS subsea protection system. Citrini favorite subsea play at 12x fwd PE.
OII.note: Current price $34 (2026-02-18). Cheapest defense exposure per Citrini. Oil & gas base business as floor.

VVV.current_thesis: Privacy-first AI platform. Real revenue, buyback+burn model. Erik Voorhees. Wait for pullback after 130% pump.
VVV.note: Current price ~$3.50 (2026-02-15). Emissions cut to 6M/yr, ~$90K/wk buyback+burn. Coinbase+Binance listed. Buy zone = pullback to pre-pump levels.
